About Me

I am a passionate horse racing expert, a wordsmith, and an intrepid explorer of new frontiers. I am your guide on a thrilling journey where the realm of horse racing collides with imaginative storytelling.

But my talents don't stop at the racetrack. I'm also have an innate gift for crafting captivating plots and ingenious ideas. My commitment to delivering high-quality content on time while tailoring it precisely to meet your needs sets me apart as a true asset to any project.

Don't just take my word for it; my writing prowess has left a lasting impression on those I've collaborated with. I have the ability to craft compelling content on any topic that is at least a tad close to my heart. In other words, I prefer writing stories centered around lgbt+ themes combined with a detective plot, fantasy worlds, or exploration of sci-fi tropes like from Philip K Dick's masterpieces.

Being a keen gamer, I am thrilled at the prospect of writing a quest or a whole plot for your project. As I have published a book and collaborated on an escape room game, I am ready to work on something bigger. Moreover, stories are what I enjoy the most about any games as my favorite ones are the Dragon Age saga, Mass Effect saga, and the Witcher saga.

Regarding my copywriting skills, I have been working with a Spanish company VIME. For their clients, I came up with dozens of articles about mobile apps and other tech stuff, AI and video games, lifestyle, and sports. As long as the instructions are clear, I'm capable of delivering quality content revolving about basically anything.

So, whether you're here for the thrill of the races, seeking captivating narratives, or looking for a talented wordsmith to elevate your project, you've come to the right place. Let's embark on this exciting journey together! Welcome to my world; I can't wait to share it with you.

Captivating Stories

I published a book in 2022 that was praised for the characters, character development, and dialogues. I usually focus on LGBT+ stories with hints of humor; however, I can easily modify my style to your needs. In 2023, a couple of guys approached me with their outdoor game, resembling an escape room one. I created a custom story for the game, loosely based on a legend emanating from a local village. Therefore, I really can either focus on an elaborate quest for your game or a whole story. It depends on you :)

Script or Story?

I deliver a compelling narrative tailored to your needs. I can provide the script with dialogues and straightforward notes on characters, their background, motivations, etc. However, providing you with elaborated character arcs, an overall plot, and descriptive lore of the world the story is set in would be an enthralling option. Gladly, I will embark on such a journey with you!

Worldbuilding

Maybe you're not interested in the characters and dialogues as you just desire a new world in which you could place your story. No problem, I can design a stunning new universe with an elaborate history of conflicts and peaceful times, including details on the original countries and their culture, and being a linguist, I can devise new languages just for your story!

Copywriter
